metadata.title: CVE-2022-46884 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A potential use-after-free vulnerability existed in SVG Images if theRefresh Driver was destroyed at an inopportune time. This could have leadto memory corruption or a potentially exploitable crash. *Note*: Thisadvisory was added on December 13th, 2022 after discovering it wasinadvertently left out of the original advisory. The fix was included inthe original release of Firefox 106. This vulnerability affects Firefox <106.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
